thread.title: C L Fortier
thread.title_full: NiceBadge reviewed by C L Fortier

author: C L Fortier
title: C L Fortier
text: We decided to get badges for our group at the last minute and were able to order exactly what we wanted at a very reasonable price and they looked better than anything else we looked at. The person on the phone was fantastic, the order process very easy and we received the badges ahead of the promised date. We REALLY recommend NiceBadge!!
